thread.title: TOWIE's Ferne McCann: "Spencer Matthews is really rude and a bit of an arse" - The Only Way Is Essex Reality TV -
thread.title_full: TOWIE's Ferne McCann: "Spencer Matthews is really rude and a bit of an arse" - The Only Way Is Essex News - Reality TV - Digital Spy

author: Naomi Gordon
title: TOWIE's Ferne McCann: "Spencer Matthews is really rude and a bit of an arse" - The Only Way Is Essex Reality TV -
text: Judging by these comments, TOWIE's Ferne McCann might not be tuning into the new Made in Chelsea series when it returns to our television screens. © ITV / Lime PicturesFerne and Bobby on The Only Way is Essex Discussing who the worst celebrity she's ever encountered is, the reality TV star told Digital Spy: "I've met Spencer Matthews on a number of occasions and he's always been the same - which is really rude. "And the thing is, you're in the same industry and you think, we both knew who each other is. Maybe he doesn't know who I am. Even if he didn't know, he could still be polite. © E4Spencer Matthews on Made in Chelsea "I'm always like, 'Hi, are you alright?' and he's been bit of an arse really. Just like offish and rude and not very friendly, not very warm, cold. Maybe I keep catching him on a bad day," she continued.The Only Way is Essex returned to ITVBe last night (October 4) with its Marbella special spin-off. © ITV / Lime Pictures Speaking about the new series and what we can expect, Arg disclosed to DS: "In the first time for a very long time, I'm seeing seen some big divides, huge divides. Especially with the boys. Best friends are breaking up, there are some enormous divides. Ferne added: "With the past series, the boys seem to have this loyalty - they never seem to go against what anyone says which is an amazing thing to have, and they always stick together or apologise and it's nipped in the bud."But now in the new series we see a lot of drama unfold. And there's arguments between cast members that you wouldn't expect." © ITV / Lime Pictures The show featured an unlikely fallout between Arg and fashion blogger Vas J Morgan, and discussing their spat, Ferne reflected: "There's a new situation because there's some drama between Arg, Vas and Lydia and we see Arg sticking up for Lydia."I think we see Arg in a different light."The Only Way Is Essex continues on Wednesday at 10pm on ITVBe.Made in Chelsea returns to E4 soon.
